entries.title: Focused Intent Modulation
entries.principle: Mental force can influence systems via subtle energy or symbolic channels.
methods: Fix gaze on object, visualize energetic linkage
Project directional intent from third eye region
Invoke symbol of movement and embed into object

entries.title: Symbolic Displacement
entries.principle: Create and move a symbolic representation of an object to affect its real counterpart.
steps: Draw the object's symbol on paper or digitally
Charge it with breath, emotion, and concentration
Physically move the symbol while focusing on the real object
Seal the connection with a spoken word or mudra

entries.title: Technomantic Interface Channeling
entries.principle: Bridge intent into code via sensors, speech, or neural input for real-world effect.
examples: Mindful focus triggers smart device via webhook
Voice intent launches a ritual subroutine in 42
Heartbeat sensor maps to movement via symbolic converter
